description: BEVERLY HILLS WOMEN ARE RAVING ABOUT THIS AMAZING NEW ACNE TREATMENTGoing on a hot date and... Aargh! A big ugly blemish appears on your face.- You can feel it getting bigger by the minute, it's gross!- Everyone looks at that bright red bump caked with concealer.- Your night's ruined, you're life's ruined.It doesn't have to be like that. There's a simple and effective answer.TheSpotless Facepre-absorbed pads synergistically deliver a gentle, microchemical peel to exfoliate and correct problem acne and prevent future breakouts, leaving skin cleaner, clearer and blemish free.Helps reduce acne associated redness, irritation and inflammation with a botanical complex including; Yeast, Horse Chestnut, Licorice, Olive, Ivy, Burdock and Clary Sage Extracts.It's a revolution in acne and blackhead treatment.A clinically proven product that truly addresses acne problems.- Promotes exfoliation of dead surface cells resulting in enhanced cellular renewal with Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acid complexes- Penetrates deep into pores to regulate sebum production and inhibit acne bacterial growth from within- Softens and soothes acne-prone, inflamed skin while reducing irritation and redness.Blemish Fighting Complexes Eliminate Impurities Leaving Skin Cleaner, Clearer and Blemish Free.Each Face Pad is laden with a unique combination of Salicylic Acid 2%, Glycolic Acid 5% and Lactic Acid 5% with a botanically infused formula to zap those zits fast.Enjoy theSecret Beverly Hills Formulathat the Hollywood Stars have known for years. You too can have clear, blemish free natural skin, you can have it now too!Full 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee. So nothing to lose and a naturally clear complexion to gain!Hit that"Add to Cart"button now!You deserve your own Hollywood Glam Face.
title: Best New Acne Treatment - Wipe Away That Pimple, Blackhead, Zit or Blemish from Face - It Was Best for Teens & Young Adults Compared to Lotion, Wash, Cream, Pills, Gel, X Out, Zit No More Kit. The Hollywood Secret is Now Out. Stop Scars from Forming!
